title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 28, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 28, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Sysadmin
items.content_text:
### Software / Identity Management - LDAP

*   [389 Directory Server](https://www.port389.org/) - Enterprise-class Open Source LDAP server for Linux. ([Source Code (⭐243)](https://github.com/389ds/389-ds-base)) `GPL-3.0` `C`
*   [Apache Directory Server](https://directory.apache.org/apacheds/) - Extensible and embeddable directory server, certified LDAPv3 compatible, with Kerberos 5 and Change Password Protocol support, triggers, stored procedures, queues and views. ([Source Code (⭐159)](https://github.com/apache/directory-server)) `Apache-2.0` `Java`
*   [FreeIPA](https://www.freeipa.org/) - Integrated security information management solution combining Linux (Fedora), 389 Directory Server, Kerberos, NTP, DNS, and Dogtag Certificate System (web interface and command-line administration tools). ([Source Code](https://pagure.io/freeipa)) `GPL-3.0` `Python/C/JavaScript`
*   [FreeRADIUS](https://freeradius.org/) - Multi-protocol policy server (radiusd) that implements RADIUS, DHCP, BFD, and ARP and associated client/PAM library/Apache module. ([Source Code (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/FreeRADIUS/freeradius-server)) `GPL-2.0` `C`
*   [lldap (⭐5.2k)](https://github.com/nitnelave/lldap) - Light (simplified) LDAP implementation with a simple, intuitive web interface and GraphQL support. `GPL-3.0` `Rust`
*   [OpenLDAP](https://www.openldap.org/) - Open-source implementation of the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (server, libraries and clients). ([Source Code](https://git.openldap.org/openldap/openldap)) `OLDAP-2.8` `C`
items.content_html:
Software / Identity Management - LDAP

  • 389 Directory Server - Enterprise-class Open Source LDAP server for Linux. (Source Code (⭐243)) GPL-3.0 C
  • Apache Directory Server - Extensible and embeddable directory server, certified LDAPv3 compatible, with Kerberos 5 and Change Password Protocol support, triggers, stored procedures, queues and views. (Source Code (⭐159)) Apache-2.0 Java
  • FreeIPA - Integrated security information management solution combining Linux (Fedora), 389 Directory Server, Kerberos, NTP, DNS, and Dogtag Certificate System (web interface and command-line administration tools). (Source Code) GPL-3.0 Python/C/JavaScript
  • FreeRADIUS - Multi-protocol policy server (radiusd) that implements RADIUS, DHCP, BFD, and ARP and associated client/PAM library/Apache module. (Source Code (⭐2.3k)) GPL-2.0 C
  • lldap (⭐5.2k) - Light (simplified) LDAP implementation with a simple, intuitive web interface and GraphQL support. GPL-3.0 Rust
  • OpenLDAP - Open-source implementation of the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (server, libraries and clients). (Source Code) OLDAP-2.8 C

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Framework-agnostic Plugins / Integrations

*   [vite-plugin-svg-spritemap (⭐53)](https://github.com/g-makarov/vite-plugin-svg-spritemap) - Generates a SVG spritemap from multiple .svg files.
items.content_html:
Framework-agnostic Plugins / Integrations

  • vite-plugin-svg-spritemap (⭐53) - Generates a SVG spritemap from multiple .svg files.

items.title: Awesome Elm
items.content_text:
### Examples / Other editors

*   [Elm SPA Example](http://rtfeldman.github.io/elm-spa-example/) - Full stack Elm app w/ CRUD operations, Auth, routing, pagination and more. [Code (⭐3.3k)](https://github.com/rtfeldman/elm-spa-example) / [Article](https://dev.to/rtfeldman/tour-of-an-open-source-elm-spa) / [Video](https://youtu.be/RN2_NchjrJQ)
items.content_html:
Examples / Other editors

  • Elm SPA Example - Full stack Elm app w/ CRUD operations, Auth, routing, pagination and more. Code (⭐3.3k) / Article / Video

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:

*   [mantis (⭐0)](https://github.com/dann254/mantis-zsh-theme) - Minimal theme with `git` status and information decorators.

items.title: Awesome Microservices
items.content_text:
### Node.js / Scala

*   [NestJS](https://docs.nestjs.com/) - A Node.js framework for building efficient and scalable server-side applications with a built-in microservices support.
items.content_html:
Node.js / Scala

  • NestJS - A Node.js framework for building efficient and scalable server-side applications with a built-in microservices support.

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### Email

*   [Buttondown](https://buttondown.email/) — Newsletter service. Up to 100 subscribers free
*   [Emailvalidation.io](https://emailvalidation.io) - 100 free email verifications per month
*   [Mailjet](https://www.mailjet.com/) — 6,000 emails/month free (200 emails daily sending limit)
items.content_html:
Email

  • Buttondown — Newsletter service. Up to 100 subscribers free
  • Emailvalidation.io - 100 free email verifications per month
  • Mailjet — 6,000 emails/month free (200 emails daily sending limit)

items.title: Awesome Developer First
items.content_text:
### Authentication & Identity

*   [BoxyHQ Enterprise SSO](https://boxyhq.com) - Open-source API for enterprise SSO and Directory Sync.
*   [Ory](https://ory.sh/) - Open-source identity & access-control solutions (also available as a service).

### CI/CD

*   [GitLab](https://gitlab.com/) - Open-source CI and hosted solution with Github-like abilities.

### Orchestration

*   [AWS Step Functions](https://aws.amazon.com/step-functions/) - Visual workflow service to build distributed applications and automate processes
items.content_html:
Authentication & Identity

  • BoxyHQ Enterprise SSO - Open-source API for enterprise SSO and Directory Sync.
  • Ory - Open-source identity & access-control solutions (also available as a service).

CI/CD

  • GitLab - Open-source CI and hosted solution with Github-like abilities.

Orchestration

  • AWS Step Functions - Visual workflow service to build distributed applications and automate processes

items.title: Awesome Crystal
items.content_text:
### CLI Utils

*   [git-repository (⭐4)](https://github.com/place-labs/git-repository) - A git cli wrapper querying and cloning remote repositories with minimal data transfer
items.content_html:
CLI Utils

  • git-repository (⭐4) - A git cli wrapper querying and cloning remote repositories with minimal data transfer
